data.title: MOOG_SCAT: Scattering Version of the MOOG Line Transfer Code
data.name: MOOG_SCAT
data.description: Repository for the latest version of the MOOG_SCAT code

evidence: "MOOG_SCAT is a Fortran 77 (F77) code.  To install the latest version of the code, employ one of the OS-specific Makefiles..." (indicates an end-user program built from source)

"Accordingly, a Fortran compiler is necessary... MOOG_SCAT relies completely upon SuperMongo for plotting/visualziation" (suggests a scientific analysis/visualization application, directly used in research workflows)

"Refer to the Documentation ... for information on how to install and use MOOG_SCAT." (implies users clone/build from the repository and use the code directly, with no mention of package registries or binaries)
